simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Close a given document (or, if called with no argument, the current document) by trying to remove all references from XSH2 variables to nodes belonging to the document. If no references to the document are left, the garbage-collector destroys the DOM tree and frees the memory it occupied for later reuse (depending on architecture, this may or may not give the allocated memory back to the system).
